metadata.name: Greg Vail Day Dreamin' Genesis
metadata.description:
MetaJAX presents world class saxophonist Greg Vail & his original compositions Falling Gracefully, Sunrise in Seville, and Day Dreamin' as part of his Genesis NFT Collection. For his Genesis Collection, Greg has collaborated with rapper and visual artist, Kane Mayfield who for this collection has applied his own unique signature GAN (Generative Adversarial Networks) visual treatment to each of Greg's Genesis compositions.

Collect all three of Greg's Genesis NFTs to unlock the "surprise" fourth NFT in the collection available only to holders of the first three.
Greg has worked with an ‘A-list’ of artists over the past 40 years as a professional musician. He has developed deep musical roots in American Music, Japanese and Spanish music. Most recently, Greg has been the regular touring Saxophonist with world famous Mexican Artist, Luis Miguel, touring Mexico, South America and Spain.

As a solo artist Vail has released 6 CDs as leader along with a million selling series of love songs released on Time Life/Warner named Sax by Candlelight and Sax by Moonlight, and has been working with the biggest names in Smooth Jazz, Pop & Gospel music for nearly 4 decades. Vail is a Composer, Arranger, National Recording Artist, and Educator. Greg Vail is a Yamaha Saxophone Artist.
